title: 2.3 Master Challenge 2
question: Write a pseudocode and JavaScript program to input a number and check whether the number is prime or composite. Also, check if the number is even or odd. Ask the user for a repeat with inputs Y or N . If Y is chosen, repeat. If N is chosen, exit the loop.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
